700412f-a.title: Bronx: Ampere Avenue - Stadium Avenue
700412f-a.text:
Ampere Ave., south side, between Stadium and Research Aves., showing
a small dwelling on the former Lorillard Spencer estate.
July 17, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
